mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (theme, title, writer, content, rating, uuid) VALUES (#{theme}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{rating}, #{uuid})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM review r JOIN file f ON r.uuid = f.uuid ORDER BY r.bno DESC LIMIT #{pageStart},#{qty}
mapper.update: update review set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where bno=#{bno}
